ValidationRule.description: User can't change Status manually if the values are "Sent for Approval", "Active"
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c,'Sent for Approval'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c,'Active'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c,'DeActivation Pending'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c,'Inactive') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: User can't change Status to "Sent for Approval" or "Active" or "DeActivation Pending" or "Inactive" manually
